channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2026 MLB Free Agent Signings, Trades: Orioles Acquire Taylor Ward
item.description: Keeping tabs on all of MLB's notable free agency signings, trades, and extensions ahead of the 2026 season.

item.title: 2026 World Cup Group Stage Draw: How to Watch? How Does It Work?
item.description: Explaining the 2026 World Cup draw, including how the seedings and pots work and which teams have already qualified.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Third CFP Rankings Release of 2025
item.description: FOX Sports' RJ Young offers up four takeaways from the third reveal of the College Football Playoff rankings.

item.title: Curaçao Makes History as Smallest Nation by Population To Qualify for a World Cup
item.description: Curaçao has made history by becoming the smallest nation by population to qualify for a World Cup.

item.title: Mark Pope: Kentucky is 'Completely Discombobulated Right Now'
item.description: Kentucky head coach Mark Pope addressed the Wildcats' issues following their blowout loss to Michigan State.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona's Lewandowski wanted by AC Milan
item.description: AC Milan have made veteran Barcelona striker Robert Lewandowski a target. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Statement Uruguay win shows the USMNT has come a long way in 16 months
item.description: Sixteen months ago, the U.S. men's national team hit rock bottom, losing 1-0 to Uruguay to seal its group-stage elimination from the 2024 Copa America...

item.title: 'He's already unlocked things': Why the Magic needed Desmond Bane
item.description: Orlando is hoping its all-in approach for Desmond Bane will help stars Paolo Banchero and Franz Wagner win a championship.

item.title: Texas firmly out, Miami in limbo and the G5’s flavor of the week
item.description: Trying to make sense of the constantly evolving playoff picture, conference by conference.

item.title: Fixing the Mavs: Why there's no cure-all for this Dallas disaster
item.description: Can this mess be fixed? Our NBA insiders are breaking down the Mavs' options amid a tumultuous 4-10 start.
